heading: HR00922
0: A RESOLUTION  DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO ASSESS AND EVALUATE THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE K-12 PROGRAM UNDER REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10533, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ENHANCED BASIC EDUCATION ACT OF 2013 TO DETERMINE IF THE MANDATE OF THE LAW IS EFFECTIVELY AND EFFICIENTLY CARRIED OUT
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-06-01
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00922
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO ASSESS AND EVALUATE THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE K-12 PROGRAM UNDER REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10533, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ENHANCED BASIC EDUCATION ACT OF 2013 TO DETERMINE IF THE MANDATE OF THE LAW IS EFFECTIVELY AND EFFICIENTLY CARRIED OUT
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : PICHAY, PROSPERO JR. A.

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
